title: Sagewise Reverse Mortgage Estimate
subtitle: Answer a few questions to get your no-obligation equity estimate.
metaDescription: Check reverse mortgage eligibility and get a no-obligation home equity estimate. Compare 2026 FHA HECM and proprietary options.

finalStep.loaderText: Calculating Equity Payout... Comparing 2026 FHA rates and proprietary options...
finalStep.disclaimerText: By pressing "GET EQUITY ESTIMATE" you agree to our privacy policy and consent to have an agent from one of our partners contact you by email, phone call, and/or text/SMS at the phone number and email you provide. Consent isn't a condition to purchase products.

steps.title: Are you (or a spouse) age 62 or older?
steps.description: FHA rules require a minimum age for HECM eligibility.

steps.title: What is the purpose for tapping your equity?
steps.description: We match you with lenders specializing in your goals.

steps.title: What is your estimated home equity?
steps.description: Having 50% or more equity unlocks the largest payout options.

steps.title: What is your home's current estimated value?
steps.description: HECM lending limits have increased to $1.2M+ in 2026.

steps.title: Get your free, no-obligation equity estimate?
